word: The Lord wants everyone of us to fill the very place He has appointed us. If we will walk in simplicity and godliness, and trust in the Lord, just as the little child trusts its earthly parent, He will enable us to do the work He has given us to do. If we will seek the Lord, He will work for us. . . . The Lord will work out our salvation for us, if we will commit the keeping of our souls unto Him as unto a faithful Creator. . . .
